values: 虽然；尽管；即使；纵然；然而；但是；不过

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 然而, 可是, 虽然, 纵然

bilingual.source: Although it is late, I am awake.
bilingual.target: 虽然很晚了，但我还醒着。

bilingual.source: Although she's wrong, it's not a big deal.
bilingual.target: 虽然她错了，但这不是什么大事。

bilingual.source: I don't think so, although it's a good idea.
bilingual.target: 我不这么认为，虽然这是个好主意。

bilingual.source: Although the car is old, it still runs well.
bilingual.target: 这辆车虽然旧了，但开起来仍然不错。

bilingual.source: Although these shoes are very comfortable, they're quite expensive.
bilingual.target: 虽然这些鞋子很舒服，但它们很贵。

bilingual.source: Although you may be with your parents, you should talk to them.
bilingual.target: 虽然你可能和父母在一起，但你应该和他们谈谈。

bilingual.source: Although some people may not remember who killed him, they remember what they were doing when they heard the news.
bilingual.target: 虽然有些人可能不记得是谁杀了他，但他们记得听到消息时在做什么。

bilingual.source: Although he is rich, he is very humble.
Although he is young, he is very talented.
bilingual.target: 他虽然年轻，但非常有才华。

bilingual.source: Although she is short, she runs very fast.
bilingual.target: 她虽然个子矮，但跑得非常快。

yingyinNormal.en: None taken. Although "repellent" is kind of a strong word.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没在意，虽然“厌恶”这词儿有点重了。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe, although the history of science fiction is not on your side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许吧，虽然历来的科幻小说都不能苟同这点。

yingyinNormal.en: Although it did get exciting for a minute when Amy inhaled a wool ball.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然艾米误吸进一个羊毛球时我稍微开心了一分钟。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. Although I've always hated how my right frontal lobe looks in pictures.
yingyinNormal.zh: 必须的，虽然我不喜欢我的右额叶在X光片上的效果。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay Phoebe, I guess you're next, although I really don't see the point. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，菲比，下一个是你，虽然我觉得那么做是多余的。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm thinking of joining an "I Hate Turkey Club." Although, I do love a turkey club.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我考虑要加入“我恨火鸡俱乐部”，虽然我喜欢吃火鸡三明治。

yingyinNormal.en: Merry Newton mas, everyone. I sense that's not sincere, although I have no idea why.
yingyinNormal.zh: 祝大家“牛诞快乐”，虽然说不上原因，但我觉得你这祝福并不真诚。

yingyinNormal.en: And I wept like a child, not because I was overwhelmed at having survived, although I was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我像个小孩一样嚎啕大哭，不是因为获救的激动，虽然这也是事实。

yingyinNormal.en: Although tiny, these weapons led to one of the biggest extinctions of mammals in Earth's history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然渺小，这些利器却曾导致史上哺乳动物灭绝的最严重事件。

yingyinNormal.en: Your final...? Wait. I didn't even know you were sick. Although you have been looking a little....
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的最后...等等，我都不知道你病了，虽然你看上去是有点...

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, free crab cakes? Well, that's nice. Although I was hoping to have sex tonight. Just the crab cakes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，免费的蟹肉饼吗？真是周到。虽然我本来希望今晚可以做爱的。只要蟹肉饼就行了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. Although, I think we may be seeing a little too much of some people. Aren't you a little old to be wearing a dress like that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，虽然有些人露的太多了，你不觉得自己太老了，不该穿那种衣服吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Although as I'm saying this, it occurs to me you may have been employing a rhetorical device rendering my response moot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我现在正这么说，但我感觉你可能已经使用了某种能带修辞的表达装置来使我的回应倍受争议。

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. Dunbar, any statement you make will be part of the public record as part of the DOJ report. Although this video is simply for purposes of...
yingyinNormal.zh: 邓巴女士，你所作的任何陈述都将记入司法部报告，成为公共记录。虽然这段录像只是为了……

yingyinNormal.en: You're talking about me. Very funny. Although I would enjoy drawing up a budget and forcing Raj to adhere to it without an ounce of compassion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们说的是我，真好笑。虽然我的确是会享受安排好预算。然后逼拉杰坚持计划。而且丝毫不带任何同情心。

yingyinNormal.en: I never have an off night. Okay? Although, sometimes if I'm a little bloated, I don't feel that sexy. But even then, I'm better than most!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没有一次不成功的，好吗？虽然有时候如果我吃太饱，可能就不会觉得很性感，但是即使是那样，我都比别人强！

yingyinNormal.en: I met Monica when we were just a couple of six year olds and I became friends with Chandler when he was 25, although he seemed like a six year old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认识莫妮卡时我们只是六岁大的小女孩，我们在钱德二十五岁时成了朋友，虽然他看起来很像六岁大的孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, sounds like he's back on track. Although, some days I'm, like, we've spent so much money. Why haven't we found anything? What are we doing? Oh, boy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行，听起来又重回正轨了。虽然有时候我会觉得，我们花了钱啊。怎么屁都没找到？我们是在干嘛啊？哎妈。

yingyinNormal.en: I read an article in the paper the other day that said that although US teenagers are not the most sexually active, we have the highest rate of teenage pregnancy, okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有天，我读到一篇文章上面说，虽然美国青年并不算是最性活跃的，但我们的青少年怀孕率是最高的，知道吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And, although Mr. Moon has not been available for questions, unconfirmed reports suggest he was responsible for building a water tank that exploded and flooded the building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我们无法找到月伯乐先生的亲口证实，不过根据未证实的消息，他对建造水箱，以及水箱爆炸淹没剧院负有直接责任。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> electric cars are still a rarity on roads now, this massive investment could change the picture rapidly in coming years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管电动汽车现在在道路上仍然很少见，但这种大规模投资可能会在未来几年迅速改变局面。

examination_example.sentence: But the result was a new social pattern which, <highlight>although</highlight> it resembled European society in many ways, had a character that was distinctly American.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但结果是一种新的社会模式，尽管它在许多方面与欧洲社会相似，但却具有明显的美国特色。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> technology might change the way we react, it hasn't changed our nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然技术可能会改变我们的反应方式，但它并没有改变我们的本性。

sample.mean: adj./adv. 单独的；独自的；只；仅仅；孤独的；孤立的；单干的；仅仅的
adv. 始终；总是；作为最后一着；无论如何；永远；老是；一直以来；一再
adj. 平行的；类似的；并联的；并存的；相对应的；并行的；按两种语言分班教学的学校的
n. 被风吹落的苹果；落果；意外好运气；意外之财；横财
v. 打滚；泡着；沉湎于；沉迷于；左右摇摆；颠簸
n. 钱包；皮夹子；行囊；旅行袋
conj. 虽然；尽管；不过；然而；可是；即使

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 然而, 可是, 虽然, 纵然

word_usage.usage: although是连词，常用于引导陈述语气的让步状语从句，且引导的句子常指事实，而不指设想；although不能与but在句中同时出现，即有了although就不可以再用but。
although可置于句首(多用逗号与主句分开)，也可置于句末(用不用逗号均可)，也可用于句中表强调。

在although引导的复合句中，若主句和从句的主语相同，且从句的谓语动词含动词be，则从句的主语和动词be可以省略。例：
In any case, she was very lovable although not at all tidy.
不管怎么说，她还是很可爱的，尽管一点也不爱干净。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“虽然；尽管”，语气较强，较为正式，多放在句首。
意为“虽然；尽管”，语气较弱，多用于日常的口语表达。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising
sense_info_list.synonyms: in spite of the fact that

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> humans are more advanced and intelligent, animals are more genuine and authentic in their behavior and responses than human beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然人类更高级，更聪明，但动物的行为和反应比人类更真实可信。

examination_example.sentence: All 1,100 bat species can see and often their vision is pretty good, <highlight>although</highlight> not as excellent as other night-hunting animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1100种蝙蝠都能看见东西，虽然没有其他夜行动物的视力那么好，但它们的视力通常都很好。

sense_info_list.en: used to mean 'but' or 'however' when you are commenting on a statement

examination_example.sentence: I basically thought I broke my wrist, <highlight>although</highlight>, thankfully, it's not broken.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以为我的手腕断了，不过谢天谢地，并没有断。

sample.mean: adj./adv. 单独的；独自的；只；仅仅；孤独的；孤立的；单干的；仅仅的
adv. 始终；总是；作为最后一着；无论如何；永远；老是；一直以来；一再
adj. 平行的；类似的；并联的；并存的；相对应的；并行的；按两种语言分班教学的学校的
n. 被风吹落的苹果；落果；意外好运气；意外之财；横财
v. 打滚；泡着；沉湎于；沉迷于；左右摇摆；颠簸
n. 钱包；皮夹子；行囊；旅行袋
conj. 虽然；尽管；不过；然而；可是；即使

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 然而, 可是, 虽然, 纵然

word_usage.usage: although不能与but在句中同时出现，但although可与副词yet连用。
though可以作副词，although不可。though多用于口语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> ebikes first appeared in the 90s, cheaper options and longer-lasting batteries are breathing new life into the concept.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然电动自行车最早出现在90年代，但更便宜的选择和更持久的电池正在给这个概念注入新的活力。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> fatalities are rare, the stings can cause extreme pain and stop people breathing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然死亡很少见，但这种刺痛会导致极度疼痛并使人停止呼吸。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> frozen dinners were invented in the '40s, their popularity didn't boom until televisions became popular a decade or so later.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管冷冻晚餐是在40年代发明的，但直到大约十年后电视开始流行，它们才开始流行起来。

sense_info_list.en: used to mean 'but' or 'however' when you are commenting on a statement

word_usage.usage: although不能与but在句中同时出现，但although可与副词yet连用。
though可以作副词，although不可。though多用于口语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising
sense_info_list.synonyms: in spite of the fact that

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> Mary loved flowers, neither she nor her husband was known as a gardener.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然玛丽喜欢花，但不管她还是她的丈夫都不是有名的园艺家。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> a few have come and gone, the restaurant's regular customers have stayed the same for nearly 40 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然少许人来了又走，但这家餐厅的老顾客保持了近40年不变。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> Freddy was taken from us, we all took something from Freddy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然弗雷迪被带走了，但我们都从他身上得到了一些东西。

n. 被风吹落的苹果；落果；意外好运气；意外之财；横财
v. 打滚；泡着；沉湎于；沉迷于；左右摇摆；颠簸
n. 钱包；皮夹子；行囊；旅行袋
conj. 虽然；尽管；不过；然而；可是；即使

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 然而, 可是, 虽然, 纵然

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> Simon has done well in his studies, he still works really hard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管西蒙学习成绩很好，但他仍然非常努力。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Although</highlight> these were good students, none of them had a score above 60.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些都是好学生，但他们的成绩都没有60分以上。

examination_example.sentence: We still know little about the Moon <highlight>although</highlight> men have landed on it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管人类已经登上月球，但我们对月球仍然知之甚少。

sense_info_list.en: used to mean 'but' or 'however' when you are commenting on a statement

examination_example.sentence: He couldn't sleep, <highlight>although</highlight> he tried to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他睡不着，但是他还是努力去睡。

examination_example.sentence: Their work is exciting, <highlight>although</highlight> sometimes dangerous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的工作令人兴奋，但是有时也很危险。

examination_example.sentence: My teacher was helpful, <highlight>although</highlight> I didn't learn enough to have a real conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的老师很有帮助，但是我没有学到足够的东西来进行真正的对话。

sample.mean: adj./adv. 单独的；独自的；只；仅仅；孤独的；孤立的；单干的；仅仅的
adv. 始终；总是；作为最后一着；无论如何；永远；老是；一直以来；一再
adj. 平行的；类似的；并联的；并存的；相对应的；并行的；按两种语言分班教学的学校的
n. 被风吹落的苹果；落果；意外好运气；意外之财；横财
v. 打滚；泡着；沉湎于；沉迷于；左右摇摆；颠簸
n. 钱包；皮夹子；行囊；旅行袋
conj. 虽然；尽管；不过；然而；可是；即使

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 然而, 可是, 虽然, 纵然

word_usage.usage: although不能与but在句中同时出现，但although可与副词yet连用。
though可以作副词，although不可。though多用于口语。
